Brakes.recommendedAction: Inspect entire brake system; ensure all brakes function properly.
Install/repair brakes on all wheels unless exempt.
Take vehicle out of service; repair before use.

Brakes.description: Steer axle pad < 4/32 in or disc < 1/16 in
Brakes.recommendedAction: Replace steer axle brake pads/discs before operating.

Brakes.description: Low air warning device not working
Brakes.recommendedAction: Repair or replace low air pressure warning device.
Repair ABS sensors/lights so indicator cycles properly.
